summary: This is my extremely simple change to the fairly crappy mage clothes Dark Brotherhood initiates are able to pickup on their first visit to the Sanctuary.
descriptionHtml:
Better Dark Brotherhood Mage Clothes
=====================================

This is my extremely simple change to the fairly crappy mage clothes Dark Brotherhood initiates are able to pickup on their first visit to the Sanctuary.

Alterations:
Robe - 15% damage boost to Destruction spells + 100% boost to Magicka Regen
Handwraps - 20% bonus to Sneaking
Boots - no change (muffle)
Hood - +40 Magicka

These changes aren\'t meant to be game-breaking, just to make the clothes worth using.

Installation:
Use NMM for total easiness.

Manual Installation:
Open the archive and drop the .esp into your Data directory.

To un-install, either use NMM or just delete the .esp

This is my first released mod. It\'s as simple as they come and I don\'t really intend to do much more with it. I can\'t imagine it\'ll throw up any incompatibilities but please let me know if something weird happens.
author: perrob
